casebody.data:
INTERMEC TECHNOLOGIES CORP., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. PALM, INC., Defendant-Appellee. No. 2011-1296. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Jan. 18, 2012. Carson P. Veach, Freeborn & Peters, LLP, of Chicago, IL, argued for plaintiff-*882appellant. With him on the brief were David S. Becker and Jacob D. Koering. Robert T. Haslam, Covington & Burling LLP, of Redwood Shores, CA, argued for defendant-appellee. With him on the brief were Michael M. Markman and Robert Williams of San Francisco, CA.

LOURIE, DYK, and REYNA, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

THIS CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
